trans-unit.source: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

trans-unit.source: After a hundred failed experiments, Urza was stunned to find that common silver passed through the portal undamaged. He immediately designed a golem made of the metal.
trans-unit.target: After a hundred failed experiments, Urza was stunned to find that common silver passed through the portal undamaged. He immediately designed a golem made of the metal.

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {G} for each creature you control.
trans-unit.target: {T}: Add {G} for each creature you control.

trans-unit.source: "Here sprouted the first seedling of Argoth. Here the last tree will fall."\n—Gamelen, Citanul elder
trans-unit.target: "Here sprouted the first seedling of Argoth. Here the last tree will fall."\n—Gamelen, Citanul elder
